Oop-project-1 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT API

Packages
Package
Description
org.example.oopproject1
 
org.example.oopproject1.cli
CLI commands and console menus for the Job Portal application.
org.example.oopproject1.config
Spring configuration classes: – RestClientConfig to expose RestTemplate – SecurityConfig to wire up authentication, filters, and password encoding.
org.example.oopproject1.controller
REST API controllers for managing jobs, users, recruiters, and applications.
org.example.oopproject1.dto
Data Transfer Objects used to shape API requests and responses.
org.example.oopproject1.exception
Custom exception types and global exception handler for turning service-layer errors into consistent HTTP error responses.
org.example.oopproject1.model
Domain model objects stored in MongoDB: Job, Recruiter, Application, and User entities.
org.example.oopproject1.repository
Spring Data MongoDB repository interfaces for CRUD and query operations on domain entities.
org.example.oopproject1.security
Security components: JWT utilities, authentication filters, and custom UserDetailsService implementations.
org.example.oopproject1.service
Service-layer beans containing business logic for jobs, users, recruiters, and applications.
org.example.oopproject1.util
Utility and initializer classes (data loaders, JWT helpers, etc.) used at startup or for supporting common tasks.
